description.value:
A catfolk slayer can select one of the following catfolk rogue talents (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide 92) in place of a slayer talent:

  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.gSRBNwvD3ooZ895d]{Deadly Scratch}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.kzjPnNt5iNWMyAQD]{Graceful Faller}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.YuSHmEqdkDqQ08Hx]{Nimble Climber}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.fsolfNh28jx9C33e]{Vicious Claws}

Any talent effects based on rogue level use the slayerâ€™s class level. The slayer must fulfill any prerequisites.
